scripts.mobile:run:android:device:dev: npm run web:build:static:dev && cap run android
scripts.mobile:run:android:device:dev:livereload: npm run web:build:static:dev && cap run android --live-reload --host=0.0.0.0 --port=1460 --forwardPorts=1460:1460
scripts.mobile:run:android:device:dev-remote: npm run web:build:static:dev-remote && cap run android
scripts.mobile:run:android:device:dev-remote:liv: npm run web:build:static:dev-remote && cap run android --live-reload --host=0.0.0.0 --port=1460 --forwardPorts=1460:1460
scripts.mobile:run:android:device:staging: npm run web:build:static:staging && cap run android
scripts.mobile:run:android:device:staging:livere: npm run web:build:static:staging && cap run android --live-reload --host=0.0.0.0 --port=1460 --forwardPorts=1460:1460
scripts.mobile:run:android:device:prod: npm run web:build:static:prod && cap run android
scripts.mobile:run:android:device:prod:livereloa: npm run web:build:static:prod && cap run android --live-reload --host=0.0.0.0 --port=1460 --forwardPorts=1460:1460
scripts.mobile:run:android:emulator:dev: npm run web:build:static:dev && cap sync --inline android && cap open android
scripts.mobile:run:android:emulator:dev-remote: npm run web:build:static:dev-remote && cap sync --inline android && cap open android
scripts.mobile:run:android:emulator:staging: npm run web:build:static:staging && cap sync --inline android && cap open android
scripts.mobile:run:android:emulator:prod: npm run web:build:static:prod && cap sync --inline android && cap open android
scripts.mobile:run:ios:device:dev: npm run web:build:static:dev && cap run ios
scripts.mobile:run:ios:device:dev:livereload: npm run web:build:static:dev && cap run ios --live-reload --host=0.0.0.0 --port=1460 --forwardPorts=1460:1460
scripts.mobile:run:ios:device:dev-remote: npm run web:build:static:dev-remote && cap run ios
scripts.mobile:run:ios:device:dev-remote:liverel: npm run web:build:static:dev-remote && cap run ios --live-reload --host=0.0.0.0 --port=1460 --forwardPorts=1460:1460
scripts.mobile:run:ios:device:staging: npm run web:build:static:staging && cap run ios
scripts.mobile:run:ios:device:staging:livereload: npm run web:build:static:staging && cap run ios --live-reload --host=0.0.0.0 --port=1460 --forwardPorts=1460:1460
scripts.mobile:run:ios:device:prod: npm run web:build:static:prod && cap run ios
scripts.mobile:run:ios:device:prod:livereload: npm run web:build:static:prod && cap run ios --live-reload --host=0.0.0.0 --port=1460 --forwardPorts=1460:1460
scripts.mobile:run:ios:emulator:dev: npm run web:build:static:dev && cap sync --inline ios && cap open ios
scripts.mobile:run:ios:emulator:dev-remote: npm run web:build:static:dev-remote && cap sync --inline ios && cap open ios
scripts.mobile:run:ios:emulator:staging: npm run web:build:static:staging && cap sync --inline ios && cap open ios
scripts.mobile:run:ios:emulator:prod: npm run web:build:static:prod && cap sync --inline ios && cap open ios
scripts.mobile:build:android:dev: npm run web:build:static:dev && cap sync --inline android && cap build android
scripts.mobile:build:android:dev-remote: npm run web:build:static:dev-remote && cap sync --inline android && cap build android
scripts.mobile:build:android:staging: npm run web:build:static:staging && cap sync android && cap build android
scripts.mobile:build:android:prod: npm run web:build:static:prod && cap sync android && cap build android
scripts.mobile:build:ios:dev: npm run web:build:static:dev && cap sync --inline ios && cap build ios
scripts.mobile:build:ios:dev-remote: npm run web:build:static:dev-remote && cap sync --inline ios && cap build ios
scripts.mobile:build:ios:staging: npm run web:build:static:staging && cap sync ios && cap build ios
scripts.mobile:build:ios:prod: npm run web:build:static:prod && cap sync ios && cap build ios
scripts.desktop:run:dev: npx kill-port 1460 && cross-env RUST_BACKTRACE=full tauri dev
scripts.desktop:install:target:windows: rustup target add x86_64-pc-windows-msvc && rustup target add aarch64-pc-windows-msvc
scripts.desktop:install:target:macos: rustup target add aarch64-apple-darwin && rustup target add x86_64-apple-darwin
scripts.desktop:install:target:linux: rustup target add x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu && rustup target add aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu
scripts.test:e2e:dev:chrome: npm run web:build:static:dev && npm-run-all2 --parallel web:preview:dev cypress-run-chrome
scripts.test:e2e:dev:firefox: npm run web:build:static:dev && npm-run-all2 --parallel web:preview:dev cypress-run-firefox
scripts.test:e2e:dev:edge: npm run web:build:static:dev && npm-run-all2 --parallel web:preview:dev cypress-run-edge

scripts.test:e2e:dev-remote:firefox: npm run web:build:static:dev-remote && npm-run-all2 --parallel web:preview:dev-remote cypress-run-firefox
scripts.test:e2e:dev-remote:edge: npm run web:build:static:dev-remote && npm-run-all2 --parallel web:preview:dev-remote cypress-run-edge

scripts.test:e2e:prod:firefox: npm run web:build:static:prod && npm-run-all2 --parallel web:preview:prod cypress-run-firefox
scripts.test:e2e:prod:edge: npm run web:build:static:prod && npm-run-all2 --parallel web:preview:prod cypress-run-edge
scripts.test:e2e:dev:gui:chrome: npm run web:build:static:dev && npm-run-all2 --parallel web:preview:dev cypress-open-chrome
scripts.test:e2e:dev:gui:firefox: npm run web:build:static:dev && npm-run-all2 --parallel web:preview:dev cypress-open-firefox

scripts.test:e2e:dev-remote:gui:chrome: npm run web:build:static:dev-remote && npm-run-all2 --parallel web:preview:dev-remote cypress-open-chrome

scripts.test:e2e:staging:gui:firefox: npm run web:build:static:staging && npm-run-all2 --parallel web:preview:staging cypress-open-firefox

scripts.test:e2e:prod:gui:firefox: npm run web:build:static:prod && npm-run-all2 --parallel web:preview:prod cypress-open-firefox

scripts.lint: npm run lint:prettier && npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:ts
scripts.lint:fix: prettier --write --list-different . && npm run lint:prettier --fix && npm run lint:eslint --fix
